::: {#hero-heading}
Sian Xiao obtained his Ph.D. in Theoretical and Computational Chemistry at [Southern Methodist University][smu] advised by Dr. [Peng Tao][ptao].

He is working on the combination of computational structural biology and modern machine learning techniques.
His research topic covers protein dynamics, protein allostery, drug desgin, and applications of machine learning and deep learning.

He is a soccer fan. He also loves traveling and working out.

[smu]:<https://www.smu.edu/>
[ptao]:<https://www.smu.edu/Dedman/Academics/Departments/Chemistry/People/Faculty/PengTao>

:::
